verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Gather <S%H622><s%> yourselves together, that I may tell <S%H5046><s%> you that which <S%H834><s%> shall befall <S%H7122><s%> you in the last <S%H319><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
Gather <S%H6908><s%> yourselves together, and hear, <S%H8085><s%> you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> and listen <S%H8085><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> your father. <S%H1><s%>

Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> you are my firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> my might, <S%H3581><s%> and the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of my strength, <S%H202><s%> the excellency <S%H3499><s%> of dignity, <S%H7613><s%> and the excellency <S%H3499><s%> of power: <S%H5794><s%>

Unstable <S%H6349><s%> as water, <S%H4325><s%> you shall not excel; <S%H3498><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you went <S%H5927><s%> up to your father's <S%H1><s%> bed; <S%H4904><s%> then <S%H227><s%> defiled <S%H2490><s%> you it: he went <S%H5927><s%> up to my couch. <S%H3326><s%>
Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> are brothers; <S%H251><s%> instruments <S%H3627><s%> of cruelty <S%H2555><s%> are in their habitations. <S%H4380><s%>

O my soul, <S%H5315><s%> come <S%H935><s%> not you into their secret; <S%H5475><s%> to their assembly, <S%H6951><s%> my honor, <S%H3519><s%> be not you united: <S%H3161><s%> for in their anger <S%H639><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> and in their self-will <S%H7522><s%> they dig <S%H6131><s%> down <S%H6131><s%> a wall. <S%H7794><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their anger, <S%H639><s%> for it was fierce; <S%H5794><s%> and their wrath, <S%H5678><s%> for it was cruel: <S%H7185><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> them in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Judah, <S%H3063><s%> you are he whom your brothers <S%H251><s%> shall praise: <S%H3034><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be in the neck <S%H6203><s%> of your enemies; <S%H341><s%> your father's <S%H1><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> shall bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> before you.

Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a lion's <S%H738><s%> whelp: <S%H1482><s%> from the prey, <S%H2964><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> you are gone <S%H5927><s%> up: he stooped <S%H3766><s%> down, he couched <S%H7257><s%> as a lion, <S%H738><s%> and as an old <S%H3833><s%> lion; <S%H3833><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall rouse <S%H6965><s%> him up?

The scepter <S%H7626><s%> shall not depart <S%H5493><s%> from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> nor a lawgiver <S%H2710><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3588><s%> Shiloh <S%H7886><s%> come; <S%H935><s%> and to him shall the gathering <S%H3349><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> be.

Binding <S%H631><s%> his foal <S%H5895><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> and his ass's <S%H860><s%> colt <S%H1121><s%> to the choice <S%H8321><s%> vine; <S%H8321><s%> he washed <S%H3526><s%> his garments <S%H3830><s%> in wine, <S%H3196><s%> and his clothes <S%H5497><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes: <S%H6025><s%>
His eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be red <S%H2447><s%> with wine, <S%H3196><s%> and his teeth <S%H8127><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> with milk. <S%H2461><s%>

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> at the haven <S%H2348><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and he shall be for an haven <S%H2348><s%> of ships; <S%H591><s%> and his border <S%H3411><s%> shall be to Zidon. <S%H6721><s%>
Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a strong <S%H1634><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> couching <S%H7257><s%> down between <S%H996><s%> two burdens: <S%H4942><s%>

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> that rest <S%H4496><s%> was good, <S%H2896><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> that it was pleasant; <S%H5276><s%> and bowed <S%H5186><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to bear, <S%H5445><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> a servant <S%H5647><s%> to tribute. <S%H4522><s%>
Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be a serpent <S%H5175><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> an adder <S%H8207><s%> in the path, <S%H734><s%> that bites <S%H5391><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%> heels, <S%H6119><s%> so that his rider <S%H7392><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> backward. <S%H268><s%>
I have waited <S%H6960><s%> for your salvation, <S%H3444><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Gad, <S%H1410><s%> a troop <S%H1416><s%> shall overcome <S%H1464><s%> him: but he shall overcome <S%H1464><s%> at the last. <S%H6119><s%>
Out of Asher <S%H836><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be fat, <S%H8082><s%> and he shall yield <S%H5414><s%> royal <S%H4428><s%> dainties. <S%H4574><s%>
Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a hind <S%H355><s%> let loose: <S%H7971><s%> he gives <S%H5414><s%> goodly <S%H8233><s%> words. <S%H561><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough, <S%H1121><s%> even a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%> by a well; <S%H5869><s%> whose branches <S%H1121><s%> run <S%H6805><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the wall: <S%H7791><s%>
The archers <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2671><s%> have sorely <S%H4843><s%> grieved <S%H4843><s%> him, and shot <S%H7232><s%> at him, and hated <S%H7852><s%> him:

But his bow <S%H7198><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in strength, <S%H386><s%> and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were made strong <S%H6339><s%> by the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H46><s%> God of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> (from there <S%H8033><s%> is the shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>)

Even by the God <S%H410><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> who shall help <S%H5826><s%> you; and by the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> who shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you with blessings <S%H1293><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H5921><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> that lies <S%H7257><s%> under, <S%H8478><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> of the breasts, <S%H7699><s%> and of the womb: <S%H7356><s%>

The blessings <S%H1293><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%> have prevailed <S%H1396><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of my progenitors <S%H2029><s%> to the utmost bound <S%H8379><s%> of the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> hills: <S%H1389><s%> they shall be on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and on the crown <S%H6936><s%> of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him that was separate <S%H5139><s%> from his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall shred <S%H2963><s%> as a wolf: <S%H2061><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> he shall devour <S%H398><s%> the prey, <S%H5706><s%> and at night <S%H6153><s%> he shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> is it that their father <S%H1><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them; every one <S%H376><s%> according <S%H834><s%> to his blessing <S%H1293><s%> he blessed <S%H1288><s%> them.

And he charged <S%H6680><s%> them, and said <S%H559><s%> to them, I am to be gathered <S%H622><s%> to my people: <S%H5971><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> me with my fathers <S%H1><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%>

In the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah, <S%H4375><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> with the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a burial plot. <S%H6913><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> I buried <S%H6912><s%> Leah. <S%H3812><s%>
The purchase <S%H4735><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and of the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is therein was from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth. <S%H2845><s%>

And when Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of commanding <S%H6680><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> he gathered <S%H622><s%> up his feet <S%H7272><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the bed, <S%H4296><s%> and yielded <S%H1478><s%> up the ghost, <S%H1478><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%>
